mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bg_alarm (user_id, type, message, is_read, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{type}, #{content}, 0, NOW() )
INSERT INTO bg_alarm (user_id, type, message, is_read, created_at) SELECT id, #{type}, #{content}, 0, NOW() FROM bg_user
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id AS userId, type, message AS content, is_read AS isRead, created_at AS createdAt FROM bg_alarm WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT MAX(a.id) as id, MAX(a.user_id) AS userId, MAX(u.login_id) AS loginId, a.type, a.message AS content, MAX(a.is_read) AS isRead, a.created_at AS createdAt, COUNT(*) as count FROM bg_alarm a LEFT JOIN bg_user u ON a.user_id = u.id GROUP BY a.message, a.created_at, a.type ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT 1 FROM bg_alarm GROUP BY message, created_at, type ) AS grouped_alarms
SELECT id, user_id AS userId, type, message AS content, created_at AS createdAt FROM bg_alarm ORDER BY created_at DESC
